const response = await client.security.putRoleMapping({
  name: "native1_users",
  refresh: "true",
  roles: ["user"],
  rules: {
    all: [
      {
        field: {
          "realm.name": "native1",
        },
      },
      {
        field: {
          username: "principalname1",
        },
      },
    ],
  },
  enabled: true,
});
console.log(response);
